title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A foundational guide to writing readable, maintainable, and efficient software. Martin emphasizes principles of craftsmanship, refactoring, and naming conventions, helping developers transform messy code into elegant solutions.

title: Fluent Python
author: Luciano Ramalho
description: An advanced exploration of Python’s most expressive features, including data structures, functions, and object-oriented patterns. Ramalho teaches how to write idiomatic Python that’s both powerful and Pythonic, ideal for experienced developers looking to deepen their fluency
